mapper.sql: id, key_id, name, type, authorization_number, authorization_date, pct_patent_or_not, pct_patent_name, pct_patent_application_number, pct_patent_application_date, pct_patent_priority_date, in_country, all_auther_name, no1_auther_number, no2_auther_name, no2_auther_number, no3_auther_name, no3_auther_number, no4_auther_name, no4_auther_number, no5_auther_name, no5_auther_number, no6_auther_name, no6_auther_number, no7_auther_name, no7_auther_number, no8_auther_name, no8_auther_number, no9_auther_name, no9_auther_number, no10_auther_name, no10_auther_number, claim_status, no1_auther_name
mapper.select: select count(*) as total from patent e

select
from patent
name like concat('%','${name}','%')
AND type like concat('%','${type}','%')
AND key_id = #{keyId}
AND authorization_number like concat('%','${authorizationNumber}','%')
AND authorization_date like concat('%','${authorizationDate}','%')
AND pct_patent_or_not like concat('%','${pctPatentOrNot}','%')
AND pct_patent_name like concat('%','${pctPatentName}','%')
AND pct_patent_application_number like concat('%','${pctPatentApplicationNumber}','%')
AND pct_patent_application_date like concat('%','${pctPatentApplicationDate}','%')
AND pct_patent_priority_date like concat('%','${pctPatentPriorityDate}','%')
AND in_country like concat('%','${inCountry}','%')
AND all_auther_name like concat('%','${autherName}','%')
AND claim_status = #{claimStatus}
mapper.insert: insert into patent (id, key_id, name, type, authorization_number, authorization_date, pct_patent_or_not, pct_patent_name, pct_patent_application_number, pct_patent_application_date, pct_patent_priority_date, in_country, all_auther_name, no1_auther_number, no2_auther_name, no2_auther_number, no3_auther_name, no3_auther_number, no4_auther_name, no4_auther_number, no5_auther_name, no5_auther_number, no6_auther_name, no6_auther_number, no7_auther_name, no7_auther_number, no8_auther_name, no8_auther_number, no9_auther_name, no9_auther_number, no10_auther_name, no10_auther_number, claim_status, no1_auther_name) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{keyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{authorizationNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{authorizationDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pctPatentOrNot,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pctPatentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pctPatentApplicationNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pctPatentApplicationDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pctPatentPriorityDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inCountry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{allAutherName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{no1AutherNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{no2AutherName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{no2AutherNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{no3AutherName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{no3AutherNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{no4AutherName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{no4AutherNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{no5AutherName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{no5AutherNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{no6AutherName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{no6AutherNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{no7AutherName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{no7AutherNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{no8AutherName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{no8AutherNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{no9AutherName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{no9AutherNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{no10AutherName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{no10AutherNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{claimStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{no1AutherName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into public.patent ( key_id, name, type, authorization_number, authorization_date, pct_patent_or_not, pct_patent_name, pct_patent_application_number, pct_patent_application_date, pct_patent_priority_date, in_country, all_auther_name, no1_auther_number, no2_auther_name, no2_auther_number, no3_auther_name, no3_auther_number, no4_auther_name, no4_auther_number, no5_auther_name, no5_auther_number, no6_auther_name, no6_auther_number, no7_auther_name, no7_auther_number, no8_auther_name, no8_auther_number, no9_auther_name, no9_auther_number, no10_auther_name, no10_auther_number, claim_status, no1_auther_name ) values
